SELECT exam_publish_record.title, exam_publish_record.publisher, exam_publish_record.exam_session, exam_publish_record.end_time, exam_record.tel, exam_record.examiner, exam_record.actual_start_time, exam_record.actual_end_time, exam_record.objective_subject_score, exam_record.subjectvie_subject_score, exam_record.id, exam_publish_record.paper_id FROM exam_record, exam_publish_record
exam_record.exam_publish_record_id=exam_publish_record.id and exam_publish_record.exam_session like "${examSession}%"
and exam_publish_record.publisher = #{publisher} and exam_publish_record.title like "${title}%" and exam_publish_record.end_time > "${examTimeRange.get(0)}" and exam_publish_record.end_time < "${examTimeRange.get(1)}"

SELECT t.id, t.publisher, t.created_time, t.end_time, t.plan_pepole_num, t.limit_time, t.title, t.descript, t.status, t.version, t.exam_session, t.paper_id FROM exam_publish_record AS t
t.publisher like "${publisher}%" and t.title like "${title}%" and t.start_time > "${examTimeRange.get(0)}" and t.end_time < "${examTimeRange.get(1)}"
and t.created_time > "${publishTimeRange.get(0)}" and t.created_time < "${publishTimeRange.get(1)}"
